description:
Approach

Take the highway that goes through Nentón to the Mexican border at Gracias a Dios. Stop at La Trinidad (about 10 km before the border) and hire a guide. It takes about 40 minutes to walk to edge of pit. Take a small trail that goes around the entire pit to get different views.

Descent

The pit is 160m deep, so technical equipment and experience are needed to descend to the bottom.

Exit

Red tape

The area is dangerous now because of drug activity.

Beta sites

  • Speleosphere.org  : El Cimarrón

Trip reports and media

Background
name: El Cimarron
